text: Béthonsart is a commune in the Pas-de-Calais department in the Hauts-de-France region in northern France. ==Geography== A small farming village located 12 miles (20 km) northwest of Arras on the D74. ==Population== ==Sights== * A seventeenth-century farmhouse. * The church of St. Elizabeth, dating from the sixteenth century Detail of the spire ==See also== *Communes of the Pas-de- Calais department ==References== * INSEE commune file Category:Communes of Pas-de-Calais
title: Béthonsart
